tool_description: A File Server for storing and retrieveing files
name: File Storage
title: File Storage

api_list.name: getDownloadUrl
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://file-storage.p.rapidapi.com/api/file/getDownloadURL"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "file-storage.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://file-storage.p.rapidapi.com/api/file/getDownloadURL"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "file-storage.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
